fields.name: ||Ability||
fields.value: ||Starts with Peachone and 1 HP, -50% Projectile Speed, +20% Speed, +100% Luck, -10% Might/Area/Duration, +10% Cooldown, gains 20% Luck every 10 levels [Max +100%], +9998 HP at level 100, +65520 armor at level 200||

fields.name: ||Unlock||
fields.value:
||1. Have **Exdash** Unlocked as a pre-requisite
2. Kill the **Stalker** with a cart / rosary / gorgeous moon
3. Press the down arrow + enter while toastie is on screen||
